hadiths.text: Narrated Anas bin Malik:The Prophet (ﷺ) offered the Zuhr, `Asr, Maghrib and `Isha' prayers and slept for a while at a place called Al-Mahassab and then he rode towards the Ka`ba and performed Tawaf (al-Wada)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ صَلَّى الْعَصْرَ يَوْمَ النَّفْرِ بِالأَبْطَحِ
chapter.eng-name: 'Asr prayer at Abtah on the day of departure from Mina (Day of Nafr)
